subject: compatibility for r12
description_text:
Hi guys,

Just wanted to know if the attached wheel image will work with this attached adapter image? I am planning on purchasing this wheel as it is cheaper than the moza alternatives but want to know if it will work for my r12

Please let me know 

Thanks for your time
i
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Can’t view the ticket, can’t make an account via this email either. How do you expect me to read or reply haha Sent from my iPhone
Hi Mitchell Mortensen,    Our pedals are compatible with bases from all other brands, including Moza bases, ensuring a seamless racing experience across different devices.
Can I request an update on this also please Sent from my iPhone
﻿ Can I request an update on this also please Sent from my iPhone

Hi Mitchell Mortensen,    We are currently following up on the SSN5080 steering wheel order to confirm whether it has been shipped. Due to the peak season, there has been a delay in order processing, and we sincerely apologize for this. We will process your order as soon as possible and keep you updated.
Thanks for that. Will I be re inbursed on my express postage fee if it isn’t express time frame? Please let me know Regards, mitch Sent from my iPhone
Hi, Just wanting an update as I’ve paid for express shipping Would’ve been great if you did your sale on this wheel a day later! You win some you lose some I guess ? Sent from my iPhone
﻿ Can I request an update on this also please Sent from my iPhone

Hi Mitchell Mortensen,  I sincerely apologize for the delayed response.Due to the New Year holiday and the subsequent surge in orders, a significant backlog of unprocessed emails has resulted in delayed responses. We extend our deepest apologies once again.     I've checked the shipping status and it shows normal delivery with no delays. Have you received it yet?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195320603
